fields.name: Software and Technology
fields.description: Templates built for software teams, from sprint planning and bug tracking to release coordination and incident management. Ideal for engineering, DevOps, and SaaS workflows.

fields.name: Marketing and Communications
fields.description: Plan and execute campaigns, manage content calendars, track brand assets, and coordinate go-to-market initiatives with templates designed for marketing and comms teams.

fields.name: Operations
fields.description: Stay on top of business operations with workflows for process tracking, service delivery, compliance, procurement, and internal efficiency.

fields.name: Product Management
fields.description: From roadmaps and feature planning to user feedback and OKRs, these templates help PMs stay aligned across product development lifecycles.

fields.name: Design
fields.description: Templates to manage design projects, from creative briefs and user research to prototyping, reviews, and design system documentation.

fields.name: Client and Customer Management
fields.description: Ideal for customer success, onboarding, implementation, account management, and service delivery across B2B and B2C use cases.

fields.name: Healthcare
fields.description: Support clinical, operational, and compliance workflows in healthcare organizations, including care coordination, policy tracking, and quality audits.

fields.name: HR and People Ops
fields.description: Templates for managing hiring pipelines, onboarding, employee engagement, performance tracking, and internal documentation.

fields.name: Manufacturing and Production
fields.description: Track production schedules, quality checks, equipment maintenance, and supply chain tasks with templates built for industrial teams.

fields.name: Financial Services
fields.description: Handle planning, compliance, audits, reporting, and client servicing workflows across banking, insurance, and investment management.

fields.name: Retail and E-commerce
fields.description: Support merchandising, inventory management, campaign tracking, seasonal planning, and fulfillment processes in retail and DTC commerce.

fields.name: Startups

fields.name: Nonprofits
fields.description: Plan fundraising campaigns, manage volunteers, coordinate grant applications, and run board meetings with templates tailored for mission-driven organizations.
